events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred on the morning of April 1st involving a collision at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on keywords provided in the initial customer report.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the vehicle collision claim promptly for better service.
The claim was formally acknowledged, and the customer was notified about the next steps in the process.
Requested a copy of the police report, vehicle registration, and photographs of the damaged car from the claimant.
The customer promptly submitted all requested documents, including police and insurance reports for the accident.
Investigation into the circumstances of the car collision began to verify details and assess fault for the claim.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident report and damage assessments provided by the claimant.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on the damage assessment and policy coverage.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the fair offer and quick communication throughout the claim process.
The claim was officially approved after agreement on the settlement terms by both customer and insurer.
Payment for the approved claim was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account to cover vehicle repair costs.
The claim file was closed following successful payment issuance and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
The case was archived to maintain records of the auto accident claim for future reference if needed.
